description: Numbers n such that sigma(n) = sigma(n + 7).
references: J.-M. De Koninck, Ces nombres qui nous fascinent, Entry 62, p. 22, Ellipses, Paris 2008.
links: Donovan Johnson, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
maple: A015867:=proc(q) local n;for n from 1 to q do if sigma(n+7)=sigma(n) then print(n); fi; od; end:A015867(10^10); # _Paolo P. Lava_, Mar 25 2013
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_
